Text:
Am d/loading now (fast d/l too). Genuine thanks for this old movie. We users don't always realise just how much work goes into these torrents.
All torrents appreciated.
All providers special.
Thank you very much for the job! Only as a suggestion, x264 (instead of xvid) would render a pretty higher quality image.

Many thanks for your efforts.

I appreciate it being standard XviD avi because thus it can be played on almost any stand-alone player.
incredible and thanks for all the hard work, here's hoping it gets the restoration treatment like quo vadis and the robe have done recently
